response.original_title: Cinque uomini, un diario al di l√† della scena
response.overview: It was 2008. Antonio was filming his colleagues with an amateur camera in the dressing rooms of the show he was starring in. The tapes were forgotten for over ten years before becoming this film. Here, what was filmed instinctively becomes a moving, unfiltered diary, revealing the fragilities, doubts, joys and difficulties of acting. The dressing rooms appear as the other side of the stage: an intimate place where actors free themselves from their masks.
response.title: Five Men, A Diary Beyond the Stage
